bitfield.description: The DONEENA bit enables/disables the done signal. 0101 = disabled & 1010 = enabled
Single/Continuous checking mode. 0101 = Continuous & 1010 = Single
The ERRENA bit enables/disables the error signal. 0101 = disabled & 1010 = enabled
The DCCENA bit starts and stops the operation of the dcc 0101 = disabled & 1010 = enabled
SCHEME. - (RO )
Functional release number - (RO )
Design Release Number - (RO )
Major Revision Number - (RO )
Indicates a special version of the module. May not be supported by standard software - (RO )
Minor revision number. - (RO )
The seed value for Counter 0. The seed value that gets loaded into counter 0 (clock source 0)
The seed value for Valid Duration Counter 0.The seed value that gets loaded into the valid duration counter for clock source 0
The seed value for Counter 1. The seed value that gets loaded into counter 1 (clock source 1
Indicates whether or not an done has occured. Writing a 1 to this bit clears the flag.
Indicates whether or not an error has occured. Writing a 1 to this bit clears the flag.
This field contains the current value of counter 0. - (RO )
This field contains the current value of valid counter 0. - (RO )
This field contains the current value of counter 1. - (RO )
Key Programing (1010 is the KEY Value)

Clock source selection for Source 0DCC-A Clock source-0 selection Program value and its respective clock selected 0x0 - REF_CLK0x1 - CPU_CLK0x2 - RC_CLK0x3 - RC_CLK0x4 - RC_CLK0x5 - RC_CLK0x6 - RC_CLK0x7 - RC_CLKDCC-B Clock source-0 selection Program value and its respective clock selected 0x0 - VCLK0x1 - DSS_CLK0x2 - BSS_CLK0x3 - QSPI_CLK0x4 - FDCAN_CLK0x5 - REF_CLK0x6 - CPU_CLK0x7 - RC_CLK
